torso.transformationDescription:
After just a few moments, the transformation comes to an end, and [npc.she] [npc.verb(let)] out a deep sigh as the itching finally stops, leaving [npc.her] torso covered with bambiraptor feathers. [npc.Her] new feathers are a little soft and densely packed around [npc.her] joints and offers little added protection.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [style.boldRaptorLime(avian raptor-like)], [npc.skinFullDescription].
